author_ssm: Brooklyn Collection staff and finding aid revised and updated by Diana Bowers-Smith
abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn Letterhead Collection spans 200 years of business in Brooklyn. Several thousand different businesses, institutions, and organizations are represented in the collection, including carpenters, plumbers, painters, city agencies, religious institutions, and more.
